title: Did my ticket send?
body: I've been having problems with my league account, it will crash in game at a steady frame rate and minimum ping. At first it wouldn't even let me get to the rift and play before it crashed but now it just sudden even in bot v bot games. I tried to send a ticket to riot but when I clicked submit it just turned a darker red is that supposed to happen this is the 3rd time I've tried. Thanks for listening :-)

replies.body: Can you try using a different browser, such as Firefox or Opera? I suspect this may be an issue local to the browser you're using. I wasn't able to see a ticket in our system submitted by you, so give it another go and let me know how it goes.
